Family comedy, with F Murray Abraham, David Arquette, Ray Liotta, Andie MacDowell and Rob Schneider alongside the puppets(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Huck Finn
programme.desc: A youngster is forced to stage his own death to escape his cruel father, and embarks on a series of adventures accompanied by a runaway slave in 19th-century Mississippi. Disney adaptation of Mark Twain's classic tale, starring Elijah Wood, Courtney B Vance, Robbie Coltrane, Jason Robards, Dana Ivey, Anne Heche and Ron Perlman(n)

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: An all-American family adopts a huge St Bernard, but the father is dismayed when it turns into a one-dog disaster zone. He insists the mutt must go to a new home, but when it is kidnapped by a crooked vet, dad has a change of heart and races to the rescue. Comedy, starring Charles Grodin, Bonnie Hunt, Oliver Platt and David Duchovny(n)

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: A man who has been trapped inside a mysterious jungle board game for 26 years is eventually freed when two children start to play it. Unfortunately, he arrives with a rampaging horde of animals on his heels, leaving only one solution - to finish the game he started all those years ago. Fantasy adventure, starring Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt(n)

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancee's latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller(n)

programme.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
programme.desc: The tyrannical Ivan Ooze is accidentally released from his super-secure prison by dim-witted construction workers after 6,000 years in captivity. Vowing to conquer the Earth, he unleashes a reign of terror on Los Angeles - leaving the colour-coded champions fighting to save the world from his evil clutches. Sci-fi adventure, starring Paul Freeman, David Yost, Jason David Frank, Steve Cardenas, Karan Ashley and Johnny Yong Bosch(n)

programme.title: Dying of the Light
programme.desc: A CIA agent is diagnosed with a degenerative condition that results in him being forced to retire from the world of intelligence. When he receives word that a terrorist who once tortured him has resurfaced, he goes rogue and sets out to assassinate the man while he is still able. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Anton Yelchin and Irene Jacob

programme.title: Deadly Sisters
programme.desc: Two sisters tire of their mother's alcoholism and a string of her abusive boyfriends, and plot to kill her. Thriller, starring Abigail Breslin, Georgie Henley and Mira Sorvino

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet

programme.title: Regression
programme.desc: In 1990, Minnesota detective Bruce Kenner finds evidence of a satanic cult when he investigates the case of John Gray, who admits to sexually abusing his 17-year-old daughter Angela, but has no recollection of it. Psychological thriller, starring Ethan Hawke, Emma Watson and David Thewlis

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: A renegade general and his crack team of mercenaries take over the abandoned fortress prison of Alcatraz and threaten San Francisco with toxic nerve-gas rockets to extort a massive ransom. To break their stranglehold on the city, the FBI sends in a chemical weapons expert and a jailed SAS veteran, chosen because he is the only man to have ever escaped from the infamous penitentiary. Action thriller, with Sean Connery, Nicolas Cage and Ed Harris

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: An American teenager is sent to live with his father in Tokyo after a brush with the law, but soon becomes involved in illegal street racing. When he ends up owing money to gangsters after losing a race against a driver with Yakuza connections, he has to learn to master the Japanese style of driving to win and pay back his debts. Action adventure, starring Lucas Black, Nathalie Kelley and Bow Wow

programme.title: Spooks: The Greater Good
programme.desc: A terrorist escapes custody during a prisoner handover when the convoy he is being transported in is attacked, leading to a CIA operative being killed and relations becoming frayed between British and American intelligence agencies. MI5 officer Will Holloway must team up with disgraced intelligence chief Harry Pearce to track him down before an imminent terrorist attack on London. Spy thriller, starring Kit Harington and Peter Firth

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Two bumbling police officers working in the evidence room of a Las Vegas station are surprised to discover a bail receipt for an unusually high sum of money. They hatch a plan to find out where this money came from, and steal it for themselves. Comedy thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Elijah Wood and Jerry Lewis

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: A quadriplegic ex-cop is saved from the brink of suicide by a rookie female officer needing his expertise to form a psychological profile of a serial killer. The murderer is posing as a cab driver and terrorising Manhattan, and has a gruesome habit of taking trophies from his victims' bodies. Thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Angelina Jolie, Michael Rooker, Mike McGlone, Luis Guzman and Queen Latifah

programme.title: Blood Orange
programme.desc: Ageing rock star Bill receives a visit from Lucas, the ex-lover of his younger wife Isabelle, who demands she give him an inheritance he claims she has denied him. Bill invites Lucas to stay, hoping to make peace between them, but Lucas has a plan to get revenge, and manipulates the pool boy into helping him. Thriller, starring Iggy Pop and Kacey Clarke

programme.title: Spooks: The Greater Good
programme.desc: A terrorist escapes custody during a prisoner handover when the convoy he is being transported in is attacked, leading to a CIA operative being killed and relations becoming frayed between British and American intelligence agencies. MI5 officer Will Holloway must team up with disgraced intelligence chief Harry Pearce to track him down before an imminent terrorist attack on London. Spy thriller, starring Kit Harington and Peter Firth

programme.title: The Trust
programme.desc: Two bumbling police officers working in the evidence room of a Las Vegas station are surprised to discover a bail receipt for an unusually high sum of money. They hatch a plan to find out where this money came from, and steal it for themselves. Comedy thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Elijah Wood and Jerry Lewis

programme.title: Rise of the Footsoldier II
programme.desc: Haunted by the loss of his best friends in the Essex Range Rover murders, gangster Carlton Leach considers leaving his violent lifestyle behind him. Crime thriller, starring Ricci Harnett, Luke Mably and Steven Berkoff

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: An American teenager is sent to live with his father in Tokyo after a brush with the law, but soon becomes involved in illegal street racing. When he ends up owing money to gangsters after losing a race against a driver with Yakuza connections, he has to learn to master the Japanese style of driving to win and pay back his debts. Action adventure, starring Lucas Black, Nathalie Kelley and Bow Wow

programme.title: Exposed
programme.desc: A detective is determined to bring his dead partner's killers to justice, despite warnings from both his superior officers and the murdered man's wife to forget about it. As he delves deeper, he uncovers dangerous secrets and evidence of political corruption, with a devoutly religious woman seemingly the key to the mystery. Crime thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Ana de Armas and Mira Sorvino

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The patriarch of the Corleone crime family is hospitalised after an attempt on his life and entrusts control of his business to his three sons - the violent and unpredictable Sonny, the weak-willed Fredo, and Michael, the youngest brother, who reluctantly takes up the reins but proves to be the most ruthless of them all. Francis Ford Coppola's gangster drama, starring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, John Cazale, Talia Shire, Robert Duvall and Diane Keaton

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: News of a friend's murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. It is not long before his pursuit leads him to cross paths with FBI agent Brian O'Conner, and despite their hostile feelings toward each other, the pair work together to bring down those responsible. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster

programme.title: Captive
programme.desc: A fugitive fleeing from a police manhunt is desperate to see his newborn son. Needing a hiding place, he takes a recovering meth addict hostage in her own home. The pair make an unlikely connection as they bond over finding ways to cope with the challenges in their lives. Fact-based drama, starring Kate Mara and David Oyelowo

programme.title: Dog Day Afternoon
programme.desc: Hapless Sonny and his sidekick Sal have a plan to rob a Brooklyn bank. The novice crooks thought they would be in and out in 10 minutes, but instead find themselves stuck in an ongoing hostage situation, with the police and the media laying siege to the bank. Sidney Lumet's fact-based drama, starring Al Pacino, John Cazale and Charles Durning

programme.title: Executive Decision
programme.desc: Terrorists armed with the world's most lethal nerve gas take over an airliner and demand a massive ransom - and only a crack team of intelligence experts can stop them before they carry out their threat to destroy Washington, DC. Action thriller, starring Kurt Russell, Steven Seagal, Halle Berry, Oliver Platt, David Suchet and John Leguizamo

programme.title: Moonwalkers
programme.desc: A CIA agent travels to London in 1969 on a mission to recruit Stanley Kubrick to fake a moon landing - but is unable to locate the reclusive film-maker. A seedy rock band manager sees a chance to get rich by passing off his friend as Kubrick, but when the ruse is discovered, they have to actually shoot a fake moon landing. Comedy, starring Rupert Grint and Ron Perlman

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a gang of daredevil extreme sports athletes, and prove that they are responsible for a string of audacious bank robberies. As he pushes himself to the limit to prove his worth to the group, he forms an intense relationship with their enigmatic leader. Action thriller remake, starring Edgar Ramirez, Luke Bracey and Ray Winstone

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: An unlicensed boxing promoter and his dim-witted sidekick convince an Irish gypsy to step in for their injured fighter, but find themselves drawn into a match-fixing racket. Meanwhile, the loot from a diamond heist goes missing, leading to a bloody conflict between Russian gangsters and a Jewish mob. Guy Ritchie's comedy drama, with Jason Statham, Brad Pitt, Benicio Del Toro and Stephen Graham

programme.title: Knock Knock
programme.desc: A devoted husband is left at home alone when his family is away for the weekend. When two stranded women turn up on his doorstep, he invites them in and is tempted to take advantage of the opportunity - only to find himself drawn into a seductive and dangerous game of cat and mouse. Thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Lorenza Izzo and Ana de Armas

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: News of a friend's murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. It is not long before his pursuit leads him to cross paths with FBI agent Brian O'Conner, and despite their hostile feelings toward each other, the pair work together to bring down those responsible. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster(n)

programme.title: Terminal Velocity
programme.desc: A skydiving instructor tries to clear himself of responsibility for the death of a woman whose parachute failed to open. However, he later learns she is a Russian spy who faked her own demise, and now needs his help to foil an international criminal conspiracy out to steal a fortune in bullion. Action thriller, starring Charlie Sheen, Nastassja Kinski and James Gandolfini(n)

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos(n)

programme.title: The Godfather: Part II
programme.desc: Mafia don Michael Corleone sets out to clinch a make-or-break deal with an ageing gangster - but his plans are blown apart by a traitor within the family. Michael's story is intercut with flashback sequences chronicling the early life of his father Vito, as he makes the shift from immigrant grocery-store clerk to Mob kingpin. Francis Ford Coppola's Oscar-winning crime drama sequel, with Al Pacino, Robert De Niro, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, John Cazale, Michael V Gazzo and Lee Strasberg(n)

programme.title: Careful What You Wish For
programme.desc: A teenager gets more than he bargained for after entering into an affair with the wife of an investment banker, as a suspicious death and substantial life insurance policy embroil him in a scandal. Thriller, starring Nick Jonas, Dermot Mulroney and Isabel Lucas(n)

programme.title: US Marshals
programme.desc: A federal marshal sets out in pursuit of an escaped prisoner who is determined to prove his murder conviction was false. As the chase progresses, the marshal is forced to work with a diplomatic security agent, making him realise the fugitive is no ordinary convict and that his claims of innocence may be true. Thriller sequel, starring Tommy Lee Jones reprising his Oscar-winning role from The Fugitive, alongside Wesley Snipes and Robert Downey Jr(n)

programme.title: Spectre
programme.desc: James Bond goes rogue after receiving a cryptic message that sets him on the trail of a secretive criminal network. While his colleagues face a new threat closer to home, Bond embarks on a globetrotting journey in search of the elusive mastermind behind the syndicate - whom he discovers may have links to his own past. Spy thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Christoph Waltz, Lea Seydoux and Ralph Fiennes(n)

programme.title: Domino
programme.desc: The daughter of a respected actor becomes bored with her high society lifestyle and trains to become a bounty hunter. However, the thrills of her new occupation, coupled with the presence of television cameras recording her exploits for a reality TV show, soon send her life spiralling out of control. Thriller, starring Keira Knightley, Mickey Rourke and Jacqueline Bisset(n)

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agent's nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersen's thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott(n)

programme.title: Imperium
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent infiltrates a white supremacist movement to prevent their planned terrorist attack. Crime thriller, starring Daniel Radcliffe and Toni Collette(n)

programme.title: Spectre
programme.desc: James Bond goes rogue after receiving a cryptic message that sets him on the trail of a secretive criminal network. While his colleagues face a new threat closer to home, Bond embarks on a globetrotting journey in search of the elusive mastermind behind the syndicate - whom he discovers may have links to his own past. Spy thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Christoph Waltz, Lea Seydoux and Ralph Fiennes(n)

programme.title: The Sea Inside
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a fisherman who is paralysed from the neck down in a diving accident. After spending years dependent on others to take care of him, he decides to fight for the legal right to end his own life. Starring Javier Bardem, Belen Rueda and Lola Duenas. In Spanish, Catalan and Galician

programme.title: Tangerines
programme.desc: In the Apkhazeti region of Georgia in 1990, an Estonian man has stayed behind to harvest his crops of tangerines, but when a wounded man is left behind, he is forced to take him in. Drama, starring Lembit Ulfsak, Giorgi Nakashidze and Elmo Nuganen. In Estonian, Russian and Georgian

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films

programme.title: The New World
programme.desc: A 17th-century English settler in America falls in love with a native princess, but as conflict erupts between their people he is forced to abandon her. She is converted to Christianity, adopting European culture and forming a romance with a tobacco planter, but remains torn between two worlds. Terrence Malick's epic historical drama, starring Colin Farrell, Q'orianka Kilcher, Christian Bale and Christopher Plummer

programme.title: Couple in a Hole
programme.desc: A couple choose to live in a cave in the woods, surviving by hunting rabbits and feeding on insects. When the wife is bitten by a poisonous spider, they are forced to reconnect with the outside world and turn to a farmer for help, who takes a suspicious interest in their reasons for renouncing civilisation. Drama, starring Paul Higgins and Kate Dickie

programme.title: By the Sea
programme.desc: An American writer and his wife arrive in a picturesque French seaside town in France, their marriage in the middle of a crisis. They form friendships with locals and fellow visitors, while trying to repair the cracks in their relationship. Drama, directed by and starring Angelina Jolie, with Brad Pitt and Melanie Laurent

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowe's remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original

programme.title: The Desperate Hours
programme.desc: A suburban family taken hostage by three escaped convicts refuses to knuckle under - and eventually proves more than a match for the criminals. William Wyler's thriller, starring Humphrey Bogart, Fredric March, Martha Scott and Arthur Kennedy

programme.title: Stand By Me
programme.desc: Four 12-year-old best friends embark on a life-changing adventure in the Oregon wilderness in search of a missing teenager's body, unaware of the trials and triumphs that await them. Rob Reiner's 1950s-set coming-of-age drama, based on a novella by Stephen King, starring River Phoenix, Wil Wheaton, Jerry O'Connell, Corey Feldman, Kiefer Sutherland and Richard Dreyfuss

programme.title: By the Sea
programme.desc: An American writer and his wife arrive in a picturesque French seaside town in France, their marriage in the middle of a crisis. They form friendships with locals and fellow visitors, while trying to repair the cracks in their relationship. Drama, directed by and starring Angelina Jolie, with Brad Pitt and Melanie Laurent

programme.title: Maggie's Plan
programme.desc: A young New Yorker's plan to have a kid on her own is derailed when she falls for a married man. Romantic comedy, starring Greta Gerwig, Ethan Hawke and Bill Hader

programme.title: Miller's Crossing
programme.desc: A Mob boss watches as his empire crumbles around him after he refuses to have his girlfriend's brother killed. A disgruntled henchman responds by heading up a breakaway criminal faction, while the boss's right-hand man tries to decide where his loyalties lie. The Coen brothers' Prohibition-era gangster thriller, starring Gabriel Byrne, Albert Finney, Marcia Gay Harden and John Turturro

programme.title: Me and Kaminski
programme.desc: An ambitious art journalist journeys to the remote Alps to track down a legendary artist, whom he hopes dies soon so that he can cash in on his article. Drama, starring Daniel Bruhl, Jesper Christensen and Amira Casar

programme.title: Partisan
programme.desc: A young boy raised to be an assassin starts to question the ways of his community's charismatic and domineering leader. Drama, with Vincent Cassel, Jeremy Chabriel and Florence Mezzara

programme.title: The Black Orchid
programme.desc: A gangster's widow blames herself for her husband's death, as she becomes the subject of malicious rumours that she drove him to a life of crime. A man who is also widowed falls in love with her, but his daughter is determined to stop them from marrying. Comedy, starring Sophia Loren, Anthony Quinn, Ina Balin and Peter Mark Richman

programme.title: American Fable
programme.desc: When 11-year-old Gitty discovers that her beloved father is hiding a wealthy man in her family's silo in order to save their struggling farm, she is forced to choose between saving the man's life or protecting her family from the consequences of their actions. Thriller, starring Peyton Kennedy, Richard Schiff and Kip Pardue

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman becomes drawn to a man she meets while caring for her hospitalised mother-in-law. Taiwanese drama, starring Shiang-chyi Chen, Ming-hsiang Tung and Ming-Hua Pai

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: Misanthropic Korean War veteran Walt leads an isolated existence, and has a tense relationship with his family and nothing but contempt for his neighbours. When a teenager attempts to steal his prized car, he ends up trying to reform the thief, making a connection with the boy's relatives and defending them from a street gang. Drama, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood. With Christopher Carley and Bee Vang

programme.title: Dead Calm
programme.desc: A husband and wife take a yachting trip to help recover from the death of their son. While out on the open water the couple spot a sinking ship and manage to save the only person left on board - but they come to bitterly regret their good deed when the situation turns dark and a fraught battle of wits ensues. Thriller, based on a novel by Charles Williams, with Sam Neill, Nicole Kidman and Billy Zane

programme.title: The Blue Max
programme.desc: A low-born German fighter pilot's determination to win the flying corps' highest award rankles with his aristocratic comrades. Meanwhile, his clandestine affair with the wife of his commanding officer risks endangering lives and destroying his own reputation. First World War drama based on Jack D Hunter's novel, starring George Peppard, Ursula Andress, James Mason and Jeremy Kemp

programme.title: Our Little Sister
programme.desc: Three sisters who share a house together receive word that their estranged father has died. They travel to attend his funeral, only to discover he has a teenage daughter by another mother, who is now an orphan. They invite the girl to live with them, sparking a journey of self-discovery for all four women. Drama based on Akimi Yoshida's comic book series, starring Haruka Ayase, Masami Nagasawa, Kaho and Suzu Hirose. In Japanese

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: Misanthropic Korean War veteran Walt leads an isolated existence, and has a tense relationship with his family and nothing but contempt for his neighbours. When a teenager attempts to steal his prized car, he ends up trying to reform the thief, making a connection with the boy's relatives and defending them from a street gang. Drama, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood. With Christopher Carley and Bee Vang

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A scientist is fired from his job with a tobacco company, and agrees to expose his former employers' secrets to a journalist - including the allegation that the company had deliberately increased the addictive quality of cigarettes. Michael Mann's fact-based drama, starring Al Pacino, Russell Crowe, Christopher Plummer, Diane Venora and Philip Baker Hall

programme.title: Garden State
programme.desc: A TV actor shuffles through life emotionally numbed by the drugs prescribed for him by his stern psychiatrist father. However, he decides to ditch the pills when returning home for his mother's funeral. Free of medication, his apathy begins to lift, and an eccentric local woman reawakens his joy for life. Romantic drama, written, directed by and starring Zach Braff, with Natalie Portman and Ian Holm

programme.title: Goat
programme.desc: New college student Brad is desperate to fit into his new surroundings, so taking a cue from his older brother, he decides to pledge a fraternity. All goes well at first as he attends parties and meets several girls, but as he enters into the final stretch of the pledging ritual-known as hell week, Brad finds things taking a violent turn as he has to endure a series of brutal initiation rituals. Fact-based drama, with Ben Schnetzer and Nick Jonas(n)

programme.title: Iona
programme.desc: A woman fleeing the aftermath of a violent crime seeks refuge on the Scottish island where she grew up, bringing her teenage son with her. Her return has serious ramifications for the friends she left behind, while the boy grows to understand a simpler way of life than he is used to and discovers why his mother rebelled against it. Drama, starring Ruth Negga and Douglas Henshall(n)

programme.title: The Goob
programme.desc: A teenager spends every summer helping out in his mother's cafe and working on the harvest in the nearby pumpkin fields. The latest harvest season proves a very different one, as tension brews with his mother's new boyfriend and a flirtatious relationship with a foreign worker in the fields makes him consider a different future. Drama, starring Liam Walpole and Marama Corlett(n)

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films(n)

programme.title: The Wonders
programme.desc: The lives of a family of bee keepers living in isolation in central Italy are disturbed by the arrival of a troubled teenage boy, who has been taken on as a farmhand, and a television production crew. Against her father's wishes, Gelsomina enters the family onto a reality TV show about traditional Italian food. Drama, starring Alba Rohrwacher. In Italian(n)

programme.title: The Conversation
programme.desc: An obsessive surveillance expert makes the unprofessional mistake of getting personally involved in a dangerous case. Francis Ford Coppola's thriller, starring Gene Hackman, John Cazale, Robert Duvall, Allen Garfield and Harrison Ford(n)

programme.title: Journey to the Shore
programme.desc: A wife's husband returns to her three years after he drowned at sea, and she agrees to let him take her on a journey. Drama, starring Eri Fukatsu and Tadanobu Asano(n)

programme.title: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: A hard-working family man discovers that his six-year-old son was accidentally mixed up with another baby at birth. As he considers how to resolve the situation, the devotion of his wife and the other family involved to the children they have raised makes him wonder if he has been a good father. Drama, starring Masaharu Fukuyama and Machiko Ono. In Japanese(n)

programme.title: Monty Python's The Meaning of Life
programme.desc: A series of sketches examining mankind's secrets and taboos through the trials of life from conception to death. Surreal comedy, starring the Python team of Michael Palin, Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Eric Idle, Terry Jones and Terry Gilliam. Featuring introductory short film The Crimson Permanent Assurance(n)

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: A cockney lothario leads a charmed life, enjoying casual sex with as many women as possible with no thought of the consequences. However, a series of unexpected setbacks forces him to finally take stock of his life. Comedy drama based on the play by Bill Naughton, starring Michael Caine, Jane Asher, Millicent Martin, Shirley Anne Field, Shelley Winters and Denholm Elliott(n)

programme.title: The Wonders
programme.desc: The lives of a family of bee keepers living in isolation in central Italy are disturbed by the arrival of a troubled teenage boy, who has been taken on as a farmhand, and a television production crew. Against her father's wishes, Gelsomina enters the family onto a reality TV show about traditional Italian food. Drama, starring Alba Rohrwacher. In Italian(n)

programme.title: The Conversation
programme.desc: An obsessive surveillance expert makes the unprofessional mistake of getting personally involved in a dangerous case. Francis Ford Coppola's thriller, starring Gene Hackman, John Cazale, Robert Duvall, Allen Garfield and Harrison Ford(n)

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: American officer Aldo Raine leads a squad of soldiers into occupied France on a mission to kill as many Nazis as possible and spread fear through the Third Reich. They become involved in a Jewish resistance fighter's plan to blow up the premiere of a propaganda movie - due to be attended by Hitler himself. Quentin Tarantino's wartime adventure, with Brad Pitt, Melanie Laurent, Diane Kruger, Michael Fassbender and an Oscar-winning Christoph Waltz(n)

programme.title: Eyes Without a Face
programme.desc: A surgeon is guilt-ridden when his daughter is left disfigured after an accident he caused and works tirelessly to give the girl a new face, but he turns to crime in the process. Georges Franju's surreal horror, starring Pierre Brasseur, Alida Valli and Edith Scob. In French

programme.title: The Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: A plane crashes in the blazing heat of the desert - and as time passes, the crew and passengers realise their only chance of making it through the ordeal alive is to repair the badly damaged craft. Adventure, starring James Stewart, Richard Attenborough, Peter Finch and Ernest Borgnine

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: A cavalry officer has to avoid showing preferential treatment when the son he has not seen for 15 years is posted to his fort as a cadet. His estranged wife also turns up wanting to take the boy away, but he is forced to put duty before his family when called on to rescue children kidnapped by Apaches on the Mexican border. John Ford's Western, with John Wayne, Maureen O'Hara, Ben Johnson and J Carrol Naish

programme.title: Lonely Are the Brave
programme.desc: A rebellious modern-day cowboy breaks out of jail and escapes on horseback - but reckons without the relentlessness of the authorities, who give chase by car and helicopter. A dogged sheriff leads the pursuit, coming to sympathise with his quarry. Western, starring Kirk Douglas, Walter Matthau, Gena Rowlands and George Kennedy

programme.title: Charlotte Gray
programme.desc: An unassuming woman agrees to spy for the British during the Second World War and infiltrates occupied France, while embarking on a quest to locate her pilot lover, who has been shot down. Drama adapted from Sebastian Faulks' novel, starring Cate Blanchett, Billy Crudup, Rupert Penry-Jones and Michael Gambon

programme.title: The Gunman
programme.desc: Premiere. A mercenary goes into hiding after successfully carrying out a hit on an African politician that sparks a series of uprisings and violent acts. He re-emerges years later, only to become the latest target of his former colleagues. Crime drama, starring Sean Penn, Idris Elba, Ray Winstone, Javier Bardem and Mark Rylance

programme.title: Philadelphia
programme.desc: A gay lawyer is fired after contracting Aids, and takes his former employers to court to prove he was discriminated against because of his condition. The only attorney he can find to represent him is a homophobic courtroom rival, who is forced to confront his prejudices as the case unfolds and his client's health deteriorates. Drama, starring an Oscar-winning Tom Hanks, with Denzel Washington and Antonio Banderas

programme.title: The Salt of the Earth
programme.desc: Documentary about the life and career of Brazilian photographer Sebastiao Salgado, who has spent decades travelling the world to chronicle the people and events that have shaped humanity. Directed and narrated by Wim Wenders and the photographer's son Juliano Ribeiro Salgado. In French, English and Portuguese

programme.title: The Mouse That Roared
programme.desc: The leaders of the tiny European duchy of Grand Fenwick decide to solve their bankruptcy problem by declaring war on the USA. They confidently expect to lose and thereby qualify for economic aid - but the plan takes an unexpected turn for the worse when the Americans surrender. Comedy, starring Peter Sellers in three roles, with Jean Seberg, William Hartnell, David Kossoff and Leo McKern

programme.title: Face of a Fugitive
programme.desc: A man wrongly accused of murder flees from the authorities to start a new life in a Mexican border town. He ends up helping the local sheriff deal with a corrupt rancher's crooked schemes, while falling for the lawman's sister. However, his new-found happiness is threatened when his face starts to appear on wanted posters. Western, starring Fred MacMurray, Lin McCarthy, Alan Baxter and James Coburn

programme.title: The Comancheros
programme.desc: A hard-bitten Texas Ranger joins forces with a convict and a gambler in a covert operation to run a gang of gunmen out of the territory for supplying Comanche warriors with arms and alcohol from a secret hideout in Mexico. But after infiltrating the renegades' secret camp, they have to figure out how to survive until help arrives. Western, with John Wayne, Stuart Whitman, Ina Balin, Nehemiah Persoff and Lee Marvin

programme.title: Billion Dollar Brain
programme.desc: Former secret agent Harry Palmer comes out of retirement to take a mysterious canister to Finland, and ends up embroiled in an American megalomaniac's bid to take over the world. Espionage thriller, directed by Ken Russell and starring Michael Caine, Oscar Homolka and Karl Malden

programme.title: Shallow Hal
programme.desc: Superficial Hal is only interested in dating physically perfect women, but his outlook is changed when a self-help guru hypnotises him into seeing inner beauty - and he ends up falling for a spirited overweight woman. However, when the hypnosis wears off he struggles to remember that looks are not everything. Farrelly Brothers comedy, starring Gwyneth Paltrow, Jack Black, Jason Alexander and Joe Viterelli

programme.title: Closed Circuit
programme.desc: A man stands trial for terrorism charges, but the evidence against him has been classified, so only one government-approved lawyer is allowed to see it. The attorney's ex-lover is appointed to handle the defence, and they agree to keep their past relationship a secret, but as the case unfolds, they are drawn together as evidence of a sinister conspiracy emerges. Thriller, starring Eric Bana, Rebecca Hall and Jim Broadbent

programme.title: Filth
programme.desc: A corrupt policeman with a cocaine habit plans to advance his own career by turning colleagues against each other, while also desperately hoping to persuade his ex-wife to take him back. He rapidly loses his grip on reality as the drug use spirals out of control and his web of lies grows increasingly complex. Black comedy, starring James McAvoy, Imogen Poots, Jamie Bell and Jim Broadbent

programme.title: The Sacrifice
programme.desc: As his family gathers to celebrate his birthday as the threat of nuclear war looms, disillusioned intellectual Alexander tries to strike a bargain with God. Andrei Tarkovsky's final drama, starring Erland Josephson, Susan Fleetwood and Allan Edwall. In Swedish, French and English(n)

programme.title: Winchester '73
programme.desc: A gunslinger tracks down his father's killer, but is unable to exact his revenge because the sheriff of the town makes a point of confiscating all firearms. Instead he challenges him to compete in a shooting competition to win a superb rifle, but when the murderer loses, he steals the coveted prize. Western, starring James Stewart, Shelley Winters, Dan Duryea and Stephen McNally(n)

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: A farmer in need of money agrees to guard a notorious outlaw until the train arrives to transport him to jail. Meanwhile, the pair are holed up in a hotel, where his prisoner plays mind games with him - and the villain's cohorts are waiting outside ready to engineer an escape. Western adapted from a novel by Elmore Leonard, with Van Heflin, Glenn Ford, Felicia Farr and Leora Dana(n)

programme.title: Guadalcanal Diary
programme.desc: A tough sergeant, a chaplain and two marines fight through a series of battles on the Solomon Islands during the initial skirmishes of the American forces' Pacific campaign. Second World War drama, based on the book by Richard Tregaskis, starring Preston Foster, Anthony Quinn, Lloyd Nolan, William Bendix and Richard Conte(n)

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: An American naval reserve pilot is called up for service in the Korean War, and must leave his family and civilian job as a lawyer. In command of a corps of naval pilots, he heads a bombing campaign on strategic Communist positions, but later comes to question the morality of the conflict. Adventure, starring William Holden, Grace Kelly, Fredric March and Mickey Rooney(n)

programme.title: A Good Year
programme.desc: A city trader inherits a French vineyard from his deceased uncle. But when he goes to France to get a valuation on his newly acquired property so he can sell it, a series of unexpected events leads him to reassess his priorities in life. Ridley Scott's comedy drama based on Peter Mayle's novel, starring Russell Crowe, Albert Finney, Abbie Cornish and Marion Cotillard(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: The leaders of a secret government agency plan to eliminate several agents as part of a cover-up when they face having their dark secrets exposed. One of the assassins targeted is able to evade his fate and go on the run - but his escape is threatened by his dependence on drugs to boost his physical and mental capabilities. Spy thriller sequel, with Jeremy Renner, Rachel Weisz and Edward Norton(n)

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: Successful international smuggler Chris Farraday turns his back on a life of crime to raise a family. However, his brother-in-law crosses a powerful drug lord, who forces Chris to transport billions of dollars of counterfeit money into the US, or his wife and children will be killed. Crime thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg, Kate Beckinsale, Giovanni Ribisi and Ben Foster(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A boxer comes to work on the mountain, hoping to raise the money to build a church. However, when he gets the chance to enter a match, he learns it is rigged

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John is nervous about attending a high-school reunion, feeling that his friends have all achieved more than he has

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Caroline joins in a referendum, where an affirmative vote will allow women to have equal property ownership rights. A women's rights activist visits the town and stirs up a battle of the sexes

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Nellie and Percival await the imminent birth of their first baby, but the local townsfolk are too busy arguing about the child's religious future to join in the celebrations

programme.title: Prison of Secrets
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a new convict in a women's prison, who struggles to expose a corrupt system under which guards demand sexual favours from her fellow inmates. Stephanie Zimbalist, Finola Hughes and Gary Frank star

programme.title: Holiday Engagement
programme.desc: A woman who has lived her life under constant pressure from her mother to find a man gets engaged, only for her fiance to leave her just before she is due to head home for Thanksgiving. Rather than face parental disapproval, she hires an actor to pose as her future husband. Comedy, with Bonnie Somerville, Shelley Long and Haylie Duff

programme.title: A Soldier's Love Story
programme.desc: A sergeant in the US Army serving in Afghanistan becomes a father figure to a lonely boy who writes to him from California. When the soldier returns from his tour of duty, he visits the youngster and begins to develop a relationship with the lad's divorced mother. Romantic drama, with Lori Loughlin and Johnny Messner

programme.title: The Children Nobody Wanted
programme.desc: A man saddened by the plight of orphaned children resolves to do all he can to relieve their suffering, so sets out to become the first unmarried foster parent in America. Fact-based drama, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Frederic Lehne, Noble Willingham and Matt Clark

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben starts to hunt animals for their skins to sell for profit. John-Boy organises a reenactment of a famous historical battle, leaving Grandpa ashamed, as he has exaggerated his own part in the actual event

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mrs Oleson's wealthy nephew arrives in Walnut Grove to stay with the Ingalls family. The youngster, who has a troubled past, soon he learns a few lessons about life and love

programme.title: This Child Is Mine
programme.desc: A couple adopt a baby girl, but the teenage mother fights a legal battle to regain custody of the child. Fact-based drama, starring Lindsay Wagner, Chris Sarandon and Nancy McKeon

programme.title: A Nightmare Come True
programme.desc: A nurse tries to persuade her mother to leave her cruel father, but has little success. On another visit home, it seems she has finally taken her advice and left. But when the nurse starts to suffer horrific recurring nightmares, she becomes certain her mother has been murdered. Psychological thriller, starring Katy Boyer, Gerald McRaney and Shelley Fabares

programme.title: Grace Is Gone
programme.desc: Upon hearing his wife was killed in the Iraq war, a father takes his two daughters on a road trip to Florida. Drama, starring John Cusack, Shelan O'Keefe and Gracie Bednarczyk

programme.title: Roots: The Next Generations
programme.desc: Simon tries to improve farming practices in Alabama during the Great Depression, and finds an ally in an agricultural agent - but they both acquire influential enemies

programme.title: House of Secrets
programme.desc: A recently divorced woman called Julie, who left her abusive husband Sam, must figure out who keeps on breaking into her home. Mystery drama, starring Bianca Lawson, Brendan Fehr and Neil Jackson

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy shows a reporter writing a guide book around the community, but John worries about what he might uncover

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jason struggles to find time to cope with his studies, his girlfriend and his band

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Almanzo's brother Royal leaves his two kids with the Wilders while he and his wife take a well-earned holiday, but the youngsters prove to be quite a handful

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Farmer Joe Kagan is distraught to find out that Hester Sue, the woman he gave up everything to be with, is engaged to someone else, so he takes it upon himself to change her mind

programme.title: SOS Titanic
programme.desc: Recreation of the sinking of the luxury liner after a collision with an iceberg during its maiden voyage from Southampton to New York City in 1912, following various passengers including a newlywed couple and a group of Irish emigrants hoping to start new lives in America. Documentary-style drama, starring David Janssen, Cloris Leachman and Susan St James

programme.title: A Christmas Wedding Date
programme.desc: A woman returns to her home town after 10 years away to attend a wedding, and ends up magically reliving the day over and over again. The experience gives her a chance to see a different side to the people she has rejected to further her career, and she rebuilds bridges with her mother and her high-school boyfriend. Comedy, with Marla Sokoloff and Chris Carmack

programme.title: Sacrifices of the Heart
programme.desc: A Los Angeles lawyer returns to the family home when she learns her estranged father has started to show signs of Alzheimer's disease. She hopes to resolve the problems that drove them apart and confront a deeply traumatic experience from her childhood. Drama, starring Melissa Gilbert, Ken Howard, Cyril O'Reilly and Lisa Pelikan

programme.title: Homeless
programme.desc: An apartment guard and his family are left homeless when the building - which serves as both his workplace and home - burns down. The desperate dad seeks shelter with his brother, but a disagreement soon leaves the man and his loved ones on the street with nowhere to go. Drama, starring Jeff Daniels, Kathy Bates and Christine Lahti

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy takes in a runaway child fleeing from her abusive stepfather. However, Grandpa is suspicious of her story

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Pregnant Caroline worries that the baby she is carrying will not be the boy her husband has always wanted

programme.title: November Christmas
programme.desc: A father whose daughter is seriously ill fears she will not live through the year. He is determined to make sure her remaining time is happy, and with the help of his neighbours, he arranges to celebrate Halloween and Christmas months ahead of schedule so she can enjoy both holidays. Drama, starring John Corbett and Sam Elliott

programme.title: Love at the Christmas Table
programme.desc: Family friends Sam and Kat grew up on together, spending every Christmas Eve at the children's table. They have shared the highs and lows of early adulthood, but as he grows older Sam begins to realise the affection may be more deeper than he had imagined. Drama, starring Danica McKellar, Dustin Milligan and Lea Thompson

programme.title: A Boyfriend for Christmas
programme.desc: A 13-year-old girl wishes Santa would bring her a boyfriend for Christmas. Twenty years later, she is a lawyer recovering from a break-up and dreading Christmas with her parents. She receives an unexpected visit from a handsome stranger, who appears to be the answer to her teenage wish. Romantic drama, starring Kelli Williams, Shane Baumel, Charles Durning and Patrick Muldoon

programme.title: Roots: The Next Generations
programme.desc: Alex drops out of college and ends up joining the navy during the Second World War. While he is away at sea, he learns he is a father

programme.title: No One Would Tell
programme.desc: A shy teenager thinks all her dreams have come true when the school's star athlete asks her out. However, the relationship soon turns sour as her seemingly perfect boyfriend becomes possessive, controlling and violent. Drama, starring Fred Savage, Candace Cameron Bure, Gregory Alan Williams and Rodney Eastman

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy writes an article about a woman who performs wing walking stunts, whom Jim-Bob falls for. However, she mistakenly thinks John-Boy is her secret admirer. Maude Gormley gives her goat to the family in return for a rocking chair(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A forestry student visits the family, and Mary Ellen and Erin both fall for him(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura quits her teaching job, leaving the children to face the tender mercies of Mrs Oleson, who immediately sets about making changes to the curriculum(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part one of two. Albert falls for a traumatised schoolgirl hiding a terrible secret, but her father tries to put a stop to their relationship, forcing them to meet in secret(n)

programme.title: The Scarlet and the Black
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama about Monsignor Hugh O'Flaherty, a cleric who rescued thousands of PoWs and Italian resistance fighters from the Gestapo. Starring Gregory Peck, Christopher Plummer and John Gielgud(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Stallion
programme.desc: A 16-year-old girl adores the horses she and her grandfather have raised in the Welsh mountains, but when her grandfather dies, a tragic past is revealed. Drama, starring Daniel J Travanti, Lynette Davies and Sian MacLean(n)

programme.title: Charms for the Easy Life
programme.desc: A self-educated freethinking woman takes in her adult daughter and grandchild, and encourages them both to follow their dreams. While the grandmother is busy with an ongoing feud with a local doctor, the two younger women overcome their distrust of men and begin to fall in love - one with a lawyer, the other with a wounded soldier. Period drama set in the 1930s, with Gena Rowlands, Mimi Rogers, Susan May Pratt and Kenneth Mitchell(n)

programme.title: Just Breathe
programme.desc: Unruly teenager Sydney's endless partying and shoplifting prompts her distraught single mother to take drastic action - she sends her daughter to live with her father and his pregnant wife. At first Sydney rebels against her new life, but when she befriends a local girl whose mum has died of cancer, she begins to appreciate how lucky she is to have a loving family. Drama, with Brittney Wilson, Melora Hardin and Paul McGillion(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia gets a job working for a dressmaker, but as her responsibilities grow, she starts to miss leading a simple life(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: I'll Be Waving as You Drive Away - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. The Ingalls family faces yet more tribulation as Mary's eyesight deteriorates. Drama, starring Michael Landon(n)

programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: A battered wife with three children is persuaded by her sister to leave her abusive husband, but he continues to subject her to a barrage of harassment and threats - until the situation culminates in a fatal confrontation that changes the lives of all involved. Drama, starring Isabella Hofmann, Seth Adkins, Tracy Nelson and Matt Cooke(n)

programme.title: Sleeping with the Devil
programme.desc: A woman's life is turned upside down by the discovery that her seemingly perfect boyfriend is psychotically unbalanced and, as his mania increases, he pays a killer to gun her down. Drama, starring Shannen Doherty, Tim Matheson, Bonnie Bartlett and Steve Eastin(n)

programme.title: Hollywood Wives: The New Generation
programme.desc: A Hollywood star becomes convinced her husband is cheating on her, so hires a private eye to discover the truth. Meanwhile, a director's wife has an affair with an aspiring writer and a soul singer tries to form a closer relationship with her daughter. Drama, based on Jackie Collins' novel, starring Farrah Fawcett, Robin Givens and Melissa Gilbert(n)

programme.title: Roots: The Next Generations
programme.desc: Alex is hired to write Malcolm X's biography and when the activist is murdered, he turns his attention to his own family history. With James Earl Jones(n)

programme.title: Telling Secrets
programme.desc: Part one of two. A woman is shocked to learn of her husband's infidelity, and her reaction leaves a lot to be desired as she vows to hunt down the other woman and kill her. Drama, starring Cybill Shepherd, Ken Olin and Christopher McDonald(n)

programme.title: Where Are My Children
programme.desc: A single mother is arrested by the FBI and serves a short prison sentence. However, when she is released, she discovers her children were adopted in the intervening time and all records have been lost. She faces a 25-year struggle to be reunited with her family. Fact-based drama, starring Marg Helgenberger, Corbin Bernsen, Christopher Noth and Bonnie Bartlett

credits.writer: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Violence, Nudity

programme.desc: In the wake of a tragic loss, Marcus and Jas' relationship is tested. Planning their final action, the gang reach out to someone from the black community that they initially spurned. In London, meanwhile, Kent's actions have a disastrous effect on the radical community, at a time when the Black Power Desk's reign of terror hits new heights - with Cullen now at the helm. Marginalized and overlooked, Pence begins to plan his escape

credits.writer: Graphic Language, Graphic Violence, Adult Content, Nudity

programme.desc: Infighting and external forces threaten to split the gang, throwing their final mission into jeopardy. Fallon colludes with the Black Power Desk, now being led by Cullen. Dhari and Marcus fight for the position of alpha male. Jas, determined, gathers materials for their ultimate action. Meanwhile, unbeknownst to Jas, Marcus receives news that threatens to destroy their relationship - and their final mission. Limited series finale

programme.title: My Home
programme.desc: The digital era offers us new technologies to protect ourselves, but are these devices defending our homes or making them more vulnerable? In this episode meet a woman whose home is invaded by a Ratter, a digital stalker who gains entry through her laptop; enter a neighborhood where residents are battling over proposed camera surveillance to monitor everyone's coming and goings; and a sex offender who received the ultimate punishment for invading his victims' privacy - life under constant surveillance(c)

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: Bradley Cooper stars as a former top chef whose drug and alcohol habit led to a career meltdown but he gets a shot at redemption when his former maître d' hires him as the head of his fine-dining restaurant in London. Stars Sienna Miller and Daniel Brühl

programme.title: A Rising Tide
programme.desc: After the destruction of his family's restaurant during Hurricane Sandy, a young chef (Hunter Parrish) must grow up quickly, taking the biggest risks of his life both in business and love. Life starts to go his way when he meets a wealthy patron (Tim Daly) and has a chance encounter with Sarah (Ashley Hinshaw). As a chain of unexpected events unfolds for all of them, as they discover the only way to achieve their dreams may be to acknowledge what they owe to others - and let destiny take its course

programme.title: Inspector Gadget
programme.desc: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer. Matthew Broderick and Rupert Everett star

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell star as undercover detectives who get involved in a case of drug trafficking and murder in South Florida that takes a personal turn

programme.title: Disgraced
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary examining the 2003 murder of college basketball star Patrick Dennehy by teammate Carlton Dotson, and the subsequent accusations against both Baylor University and head coach Dave Bliss

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Shaun (Simon Pegg) and his friends are in for a literal night from hell when they meet up at the local pub only to find themselves fighting off hordes of brain-hungry undead. Penelope Wilton, Kate Ashfield, Lucy Davis and Bill Nighy co-star in this zombie-fraught romantic comedy

programme.title: I Am Number Four
programme.desc: The new kid in town (Alex Pettyfer) is a nomad who discovers, when mysterious assassins track him down, that he's from a lot farther away than he ever knew. Dianna Agron and Timothy Olyphant costar in this sci-fi teen thriller

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: After a ferry is bombed in New Orleans, an ATF agent joins a unique investigation using experimental surveillance technology to find the bomber - but finds himself becoming obsessed with one of the victims. Denzel Washington stars

programme.title: JIMI: All Is By My Side
programme.desc: André Benjamin stars as Jimi Hendrix in this revealing biopic from writer-director John Ridley ('12 Years A Slave'). Covering a transformative year in Hendrix's life from 1966-67, in which he went from a New York City backing musician to making his mark in London's music scene up until his Monterey Pop triumph, the film presents an intimate portrait of the sensitive young musician on the verge of becoming a rock legend

programme.title: Hardcore Henry
programme.desc: In the world's first action-adventure film shot entirely from a first person perspective, a resurrected cyborg named Henry must fight through the streets of Moscow in pursuit of his kidnapped wife

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: An ex-special forces member leads a crew of corrupt police officers and former soldiers in a daring bank robbery in this classic heist thriller. Stars Chiwetel Ejiofor, Kate Winslet, Woody Harrelson and Casey Affleck

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell star as undercover detectives who get involved in a case of drug trafficking and murder in South Florida that takes a personal turn

programme.title: Charade
programme.desc: Screen legends Cary Grant and Audrey Hepburn keep their cool in this cleverly-crafted, twisty thriller about a woman pursued through Paris by three odd characters on the hunt for her late husband's misbegotten fortune. Academy Award® winners James Coburn, George Kennedy and Walter Matthau co-star

programme.title: Ordinary People
programme.desc: Donald Sutherland and Mary Tyler Moore star as an upper-middle-class couple whose "ordinary" existence is shattered by the death of their oldest son in director Robert Redford's Oscar® winning examination of a family torn apart by tension and tragedy. Co-starring Timothy Hutton as the younger son, struggling against suicide and guilt and Judd Hirsch as the psychiatrist who provides his lifeline to survival

programme.title: You Can Count On Me
programme.desc: This two-time Oscar® nominee stars Laura Linney as a single mom whose ordered life is disrupted by a visit from her irresponsible brother (Mark Ruffalo). They weathered tragedy together as kids but now the siblings seem to have little in common, until they begin influencing each other in subtle, subversive ways. Matthew Broderick costars in this acclaimed comedy-drama

programme.title: Alexandre Dumas' The Count of Monte Cristo
programme.desc: When the young and dashing Edmond Dantes (Jim Caviezel) is betrayed by his best friend (Guy Pearce) and falsely imprisoned, he becomes consumed by thoughts of vengeance. After a miraculous escape, he transforms himself into the mysterious and wealthy Count of Monte Cristo, insinuates himself into the French nobility and uses a hidden treasure to put his plan of revenge in action

A short story by Stephen King becomes this horror hit about a travel writer (John Cusack) who spends his nights debunking haunted hotel rooms - until he encounters one legendary site that turns out to be the real, terrifying deal. Samuel L. Jackson and Mary McCormack costar in this chilling adaptation

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Demented spoof of end-of-the-world epics, where plucky survivors attempt to save the planet from meteors and rabid squirrels. Matt Lanter, Vanessa Minnillo and Kim Kardashian star in this cheeky satire

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons

programme.title: Burn Motherf*cker, Burn!
programme.desc: On April 29, 1992, Los Angeles exploded when four police officers were acquitted in the beating of Rodney King. But the city had been smoldering for years. This provocative documentary looks at how decades of racial tensions, injustice and a troubled relationship between the LAPD and the African-American community led to the uprising. Local residents, artists and community organizers share firsthand accounts of police brutality, the ‘65 Watts riots, the rise of LA street gangs and the ‘92 incident

programme.title: The American
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner George Clooney stars as an assassin who hides out in an idyllic Italian town, performing one last hit before leaving the death trade in this elegiac thriller from director Anton Corbijn(n)

programme.title: The Hurt Locker
programme.desc: The Academy Awards® for Best Picture, Best Director and Best Original Screenplay went to this gritty war drama about a psychologically unglued bomb removal expert plying his trade in Iraq while his crew becomes increasingly unnerved by his cowboy recklessness. Jeremy Renner, Anthony Mackie and Brian Geraghty star in this acclaimed, tension-filled journey into the heart of darkness(n)

programme.title: National Lampoon's Van Wilder - The Rise of Taj
programme.desc: Kal Penn stars in this sequel to the comedy smash "Van Wilder" as the protege to a legendary party animal, who sets out to prove his skills by transforming a stodgy British school of higher learning into the new Eurpean capital of rowdy, raunchy fun(n)

programme.title: Gringo: The Dangerous Life of John McAfee
programme.desc: Documentary about the bizarre and scandalous life of tech millionaire John McAfee - famed inventor of anti-virus software - who goes off the grid to live in Belize, building a compound and harem, becoming a drug lord and developing an armed security force to guard himself against the police until he is a suspect in his neighbor's murder and must make a great escape(n)

programme.title: Scrooged
programme.desc: Christmas Eve hijinks put Frank Cross (Bill Murray) in a ghostly time warp in this take-off of Charles Dickens' "A Christmas Carol." Cross, who has made the meteoric rise from the depths of the mailroom to TV network president, is a modern-day Scrooge. Before the night is over he'll be visited by a maniacal New York cab driver from the past, a present-day fairy who's into pratfalls and, finally, a ghoulish, seven-foot headless messenger from the future(n)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee In Los Angeles
programme.desc: Mick Dundee (Paul Hogan) is back in this sequel that finds the famed crocodile hunter relocating with his lady love Sue (Linda Kozlowski) and their son to the urban jungle of Los Angeles, where Sue takes over her father's newspaper while Mick and his boy are soon up to their necks in trouble investigating a mystery. Paul Rodriguez costars in this warmly funny follow-up(n)

programme.title: Diary of a Mad Black Woman
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote and costars in this box office smash about a divorcee (Kimberly Elise) who learns to trust and love again after a nasty break up with her arrogant and emotionally distant attorney husband, thanks to comically sage advice from her sassy grandmother Madea. Shemar Moore and Cicely Tyson costar(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: An inner-city single mother (Angela Bassett) packs up her kids and heads off to visit the crass but surprisingly sweet country cousins she never knew she had in this warm comedy costarring Rick Fox and Sofia Vergara(n)

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: Something has gone wrong at a remote scientific research station on Mars. Sealing off the portal to Earth, Sarge (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson), Reaper (Karl Urban) and their team must use every weapon at their disposal—and some they find along the way—to carry out their orders: nothing gets out alive(n)

programme.title: Steve Byrne: Tell The Damn Joke
programme.desc: He's a comic. A husband. A dad. An American. And on top of it all, he's hilarious. Steve Byrne brings his signature style to Chicago with an all-new comedy special that holds no punches, calls it like it is and tells the damn jokes(n)

programme.title: The Beach Boys: Making Pet Sounds
programme.desc: Celebrating the 50th anniversary of the release of ‘Pet Sounds,' Brian Wilson and surviving members of The Beach Boys (Mike Love, Al Jardine, Bruce Johnston and David Marks) revisit the writing and recording of the landmark record that is consistently voted one of the top three influential albums of all time. Featuring exclusive interviews, classic archive and rare studio outtakes from the recording sessions(n)

programme.title: Breach
programme.desc: Ryan Phillippe stars as an FBI agent assigned the job of doing surveillance on a senior agent whose sexual deviance may be compromising the agency. When he learns that his new boss is actually a spy, he becomes part of a massive sting operation to bring him to justice. Also starring Academy Award® winner Chris Cooper and Laura Linney(n)

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Demented spoof of end-of-the-world epics, where plucky survivors attempt to save the planet from meteors and rabid squirrels. Matt Lanter, Vanessa Minnillo and Kim Kardashian star in this cheeky satire

programme.title: The Funhouse Massacre
programme.desc: On Halloween night, a group of notorious serial killers escape from an asylum and terrorize the patrons of a funhouse carnival - leaving only a rag-tag bunch of kids, a clueless deputy and a local sheriff to stop the carnage

programme.title: Zombie Honeymoon
programme.desc: When a beach-front encounter with a zombie during their honeymoon results in a groom with a taste for human flesh, a newlywed bride tries to make the best of a rapidly deteriorating situation in this romantic horror comedy starring Tracy Coogan and Graham Sibley

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Shaun (Simon Pegg) and his friends are in for a literal night from hell when they meet up at the local pub only to find themselves fighting off hordes of brain-hungry undead. Penelope Wilton, Kate Ashfield, Lucy Davis and Bill Nighy co-star in this zombie-fraught romantic comedy

programme.title: Hannibal Rising
programme.desc: Author Thomas Harris teams with director Peter Webber to present this horrifying, gripping prequel that reveals the origins of future serial killer Hannibal Lecter (Gaspard Ulliel), a frightened Lithuanian refugee from World War II who uses his razor-sharp mind to acquire the skills that will enable him to get grisly revenge on the soldiers that murdered his family. Gong Li costars in this dark, surprising chapter in the Lecter mythos

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town

programme.title: Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: A young martial arts enthusiast travels back in time to ancient China, where he teams up with a drunken master and a beautiful warrior maiden to fight an evil wizard and free the mythical "Monkey King." Legendary action stars Jackie Chan and Jet Li finally unite for this fun-filled adventure

programme.title: The Roost
programme.desc: Four friends en route to a wedding on Halloween night suffer an automotive mishap that lands them squarely in the lair of zombie-creating vampire bats, while a creepy "horror host" (Tom Noonan) occasionally interrupts the action to comment on this exquisite slice of B-movie hokum. Real-life siblings Wil and Vanessa Horneff costar with Karl Jacob, Sean Reid and genre guru Larry Fessenden, who turns in a cameo

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: After the death of a child, a vengeful spirit takes possession of a woman, who forces each family member to confess to their buried lies or face the morbid consequences of their sins

programme.title: Star Kid
programme.desc: A dorky seventh grader who spends his days avoiding the class bully and dreaming of becoming a comic book hero gets to try on the superpower he's always wanted when an extraterrestrial spacecraft crashes on earth

programme.title: Dressed to Kill
programme.desc: A mysterious blonde woman kills a frustrated housewife and then goes after the high-class call girl who witnessed the murder. Stars Michael Caine, Nancy Allen and David Margulies. Directed by Brian De Palma

programme.title: Tale of Tales
programme.desc: Lush cinematic feat of three interwoven classic Italian fairytales which feature a queen on a bitter quest, two mysterious sisters who provoke the passion of a king and a young daughter who must wrestle with her father’s obsession with a giant flea. Starring Salma Hayek and Vincent Cassel

programme.title: The Last Survivors
programme.desc: In a futuristic world where society has collapsed and water is scarce, a 17-year-old girl decides to take on the henchmen of a greedy water baron, who is violently laying claim to the precious resources that are left

programme.title: Gravy
programme.desc: Comic horror flick about a group of employees in a Mexican Cantina who are terrorized by a trio of cannibals, who lock the staff in the restaurant and go on a Halloween night killing spree. Stars Sutton Foster

programme.title: Cabin Fever
programme.desc: In this classic horror, a group of college friends retreat to a remote cabin in the woods for one last week of partying, only to find themselves snacks for a gruesome flesh-eating virus

programme.title: Nightlight

programme.title: The Death of "Superman Lives": What Happened?
programme.desc: A documentary that delves into the almost making of Hollywood movie "Superman Lives". In 1996, Warner Brothers hired director Tim Burton to assemble an elite group of artists, including Nicolas Cage as the titular hero, and what follows is "never quite made it" movie history(c)

programme.desc: A young couple find themselves face-to-face against a terrifying evil when they venture into the remote woods of Bigfoot country to research the existence of the infamous ape

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: A popular high school student is forced to hit the road after the brutal murder of his parents, setting him on a path to the ominous town of Lupine Ridge to find out the truth of his ancestry

programme.desc: An engaged couple goes away with their friends to a remote cabin to celebrate their upcoming wedding but the weekend takes a horrifying turn when dark secrets and forbidden desires are revealed and what started as a celebration quickly descends into a bloody nightmare

programme.title: The Day
programme.desc: A group of people working to stay alive in a post-apocalyptic future discover what they think is a safe, abandoned farmhouse, but they soon find themselves fighting to stay alive as a gang of bloodthirsty predators attack(n)

programme.title: Da Sweet Blood of Jesus
programme.desc: In this stylized Spike Lee thriller, a man cursed by a mysterious ancient African artifact is overwhelmed by a newfound thirst for blood, which leads him into a dangerous romance that calls into question the very nature of love, addiction, sex and status(n)

programme.title: Anarchy Parlor
programme.desc: Horror about a mysterious nomad who works at a Lithuanian tattoo parlor where he practices a dark art form passed down through the generations, giving the visiting tourists much more than they bargained for(n)

But reality soon begins warping, bouncing her through time before and after his death - and giving her a chance to change her family's fate. Julian McMahon, Nia Long, Kate Nelligan, Peter Stormare and Amber Valletta costar in this mind-bending thriller(n)

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book(n)

programme.title: Garm Wars: The Last Druid
programme.desc: In a world where clone soldiers from three military tribes are locked in a perpetual battle of air, land and technology, one clone is separated from the battle and finds herself on a quest for the truth with an unlikely trio(n)

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her(n)

programme.title: Open Water
programme.desc: Loosely inspired by a shocking true story, this chilling psychological horror story follows a bickering couple on vacation in the Caribbean who are accidentally abandoned during a diving expedition and forced to fend for themselves in the ocean as they are surrounded by sharks - while the tour operators back at the harbor take 24 hours to realize that they have left a pair of customers stranded. Blanchard Ryan and Daniel Travis star in this gripping independent hit from writer/director Chris Kentis(n)

programme.title: Premonition (2007)
programme.desc: The world of a suburban wife and mother (Sandra Bullock) is shattered when her husband is killed in a car accident. But reality soon begins warping, bouncing her through time before and after his death - and giving her a chance to change her family's fate. Julian McMahon, Nia Long, Kate Nelligan, Peter Stormare and Amber Valletta costar in this mind-bending thriller(n)

programme.title: Ginger & Rosa
programme.desc: Two inseparable teenage girls growing up in 1960s London as the Cuban Missile Crisis looms explore friendship, activism and budding desire and encounter a pivotal event that will redefine their friendship. Stars Elle Fanning, Annette Bening and Oliver Platt

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister

programme.title: River's Edge
programme.desc: The lives of a group of teenagers are thrown into a moral spin when one of them murders his girlfriend. Faced with the brutal reality of death, each must decide whether to turn their friend in to the police, or to help him escape the consequences of his dreadful deed. Stars Keanu Reeves, Crispin Glover, Ione Skye and Dennis Glover

programme.title: Alpha Dog
programme.desc: A thuggish group of privileged LA teenagers kidnap the younger brother of a junkie who refuses to pay his drug debt and take the kid to Palm Springs. Stars Justin Timberlake and Bruce Willis

programme.title: My Best Friend's Girl
programme.desc: A vulgar womanizer offers himself to jilted men as a "rebound guy" who will send their ex-lovers running back into their arms, but meets his match in the brassy former girlfriend of his best buddy. Dane Cook, Kate Hudson and Jason Biggs star in this romantic comedy

programme.title: Everything Must Go
programme.desc: Will Ferrell stars as a career salesman who loses his wife and his job on the worst day of his life and must put everything on the line - or the lawn - as he moves his possessions into his front yard in this comedy about what happens after things falls apart. Also stars Rebecca Hall. Based on the short story by Raymond Carver

programme.title: BRAND: A Second Coming
programme.desc: Documentary charting controversial comedian Russell Brand's journey from being a troubled youth in Essex to a Hollywood star, hooked on drugs, sex and fame until his unexpected evolution into a political activist

programme.title: 5 to 7
programme.desc: A young writer begins an affair with an older French woman, whose open marriage to a diplomat dictates that they can only meet for two hours each evening but their growing passion leads him to want more than just a fleeting romance

programme.title: Weiner
programme.desc: Documentary featuring a jaw-dropping, behind-the-scenes look at the attempted comeback of Anthony Weiner in 2013 as he mounts a campaign for New York City mayor in the wake of his sexting scandal. But it's not long before history repeats itself and new sexting allegations leave Weiner and his aides scrambling to contain the damage. Featuring unfettered access to the candidate and his campaign. Winner of the 2016 Sundance Grand Jury Prize for U.S. Documentary

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.title: Lenny Cooke

But over a decade later, while his peers are taking home MVP awards and championship trophies, Lenny has never played a minute in the NBA. What went wrong?
